documentType.label: other
reasons: Document is a product brochure/plan-at-a-glance (MetLife LTC LifeStage Advantage) and not an invoice, CMR transport form, or UB04 healthcare claim form.
Layout contains marketing header, plan comparison table, and descriptive rider text typical of an insurance brochure.

fields.name: plan_type_description
fields.value: Comprehensive; Monthly Reimbursement (Cash Benefit Rider available - see below)

fields.name: one_million_note
fields.value: *$1MM not available with Cash Benefit Rider

fields.name: optional_rider_shared_care
fields.value: Shared Care Rider: Insured and spouse/partner can access benefits under each other's policy once the TBA under their own policy is exhausted; When insured dies, remaining TBA under his/her policy is transferred to the spouse's/partner's policy at no extra cost; Rider available at any time, subject to underwriting; Both spouse/partners must have identical policies

fields.name: optional_rider_nonforfeiture
fields.value: Nonforfeiture Rider: Provides some benefits if policy lapses for nonpayment of premiums or if cancelled by insured; Rider must be in effect for 3 years and be in effect when the policy ends; Provides full MBA and a reduced TBA equal to the greater of: the total amount of premium paid; or 1x MBA; Available at initial application only

fields.name: optional_rider_cash_benefit
fields.value: Cash Benefit Rider: Full MBA paid as cash payment (regardless of actual charges incurred) instead of reimbursement for covered services; Available at initial application only; $1MM TBA not available; Benefits paid over annual IRC limit may be taxable

fields.name: guaranteed_purchase_option_summary
fields.value: GUARANTEED PURCHASE OPTION (GPO): Insured able to purchase additional coverage every 3 years, up to age 65, with no additional underwriting; Premium for increase in coverage is at attained age rates; Lifetime maximum increase available is 2x initial TBA and 2x initial MBA; Minimum of 25% of initial coverage must be purchased each time GPO is exercised; 10 Year Premium Payment Rider is not available with GPO.

fields.name: benefit_increase_options_summary
fields.value: BENEFIT INCREASE OPTIONS (AVAILABLE WITH CUSTOM ADVANTAGE ONLY): FUTURE PURCHASE OPTION (FPO): Increases the MBA and remaining portion of the TBA automatically by 5% of the MBA/remaining TBA; increases occur unless insured rejects in writing; If insured rejects twice in a row, insured will no longer receive automatic increases; Rider available at any time, subject to underwriting. AUTOMATIC COMPOUND INFLATION PROTECTION RIDERS: increases the MBA and remaining portion of TBA at the end of the previous policy year, either 3% or 5%, with no corresponding increase in premium; Riders available at any time, with additional underwriting.

tables.caption: Simple Advantage vs Custom Advantage plan comparison (top)
